0: AN ACT AMENDING PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1146, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "GOVERNMENT INSURANCE ACT OF 1977" AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05587
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1146, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "GOVERNMENT INSURANCE ACT OF 1977" AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to address the prolonged dependence of Filipino children to their parents, due to the passing of Republic Act No.10533 or better known as the K-12 Law which mandated Filipino children to stay in school for a longer period of time. Seeks to extend the coverage of P.D.No.1146, as amended, by extending the age of legal dependents from eighteen (18) to twenty-three (23), hence complementing the age when Filipino students normally finish their basic education and thus able to provide for themselves.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOEL, FLORENCIO G.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2019-11-27
